citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
20-APR-17.* Front gate was closed at entrance to property. Inspector then honked GOV horn and called telephone
numbers given by the licensee. Licensee texted back they were currently at a scheduled appointment and could not
be home to do a facility inspection within 30 minutes.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
20-APR-17.* Front gate was closed at entrance to property.  Inspector then honked GOV horn and called telephone
numbers given by the licensee.  Licensee texted back they were currently at a scheduled appointment and could not
be home to do a facility inspection within 30 minutes.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
